title: Only in League of Legends...

replies.body: It's the Korean F D:
I hear that, if you keep losing at Bronze V in Korea, you get demoted to EU challenger.
I hear that, if you keep losing at Wood V in EU, you get demoted to NA LCS.
so, if im in wood V NA, where do i go afterwards, or does my game auto-uninstall?
You go to Dota 2.
No you end up in the OCE
Last time I checked you end up playing COD:TDM on rust.

I'll have you know, even the most bronze OCE players are equal to challenjour NA.




Kappa
I think you got it the wrong way wrong friend, it's why OCE can't get to Worlds
I'm pretty sure you mean Turkey
Shhh! Don't speak such dark words here...

> [{quoted}](name=Legacy Hydralpha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qfy8gkKF,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T01:28:32.855+0000)
>
> You go to Dota 2.

I laughed at first but this is pretty wrong. Dota is harder than League 100 fold. League is smooth, less things to keep track of, and less intensive as far as game knowledge required to "get gud".

Still funny though.

> [{quoted}](name=Legacy Hydralpha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qfy8gkKF,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T01:28:32.855+0000)
>
> You go to Dota 2.

No, you get sent to OCE {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
did i just start server wars?

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qfy8gkKF,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T00:45:45.009+0000)
>
> so, if im in wood V NA, where do i go afterwards, or does my game auto-uninstall?

BR Challenger.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qfy8gkKF,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-21T23:59:11.506+0000)
>
> I hear that, if you keep losing at Bronze V in Korea, you get demoted to EU challenger.

Quick someone use {{summoner:21}} cause this guy just {{summoner:14}} some people, ouch.

> [{quoted}](name=Onastacia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qfy8gkKF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-21T22:55:37.279+0000)
>
> It's the Korean F D:

 'If you sleep three hours a night, you may get into a top 'SKY university;' If you sleep four hours each night, you may get into another university; if you sleep five or more hours each night, especially in your last year of high school, forget about getting into any university. - This is an actual saying in south korea.
Easy. I just sleep during the day.
In Korea,  I wouldn't even get into a community college. xD
https://i.imgflip.com/mbx1o.jpg
When you get a pentakill and still only score an A.
Been there done that
I honestly thought this post was gonna say "Only in league can you be a stoner tree man who throws his bush around everywhere and refuses to hurt animals while telling someone to kill themself"

Not when you first time a champion and get an A+
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

first time a champion and you get a chest

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Amen
I got s first time skarner :d
Only in osu! does getting an S feels like a failure...... need them SS man
Germany 75 years ago.

Only in League will you get teams like this


http://s11.postimg.org/qh1q2cqpf/Screenshot_53.png
best name censorship NA
Thanks
Well yeah I hope other games are not stealing leagues champs

It's worse when you DON'T own the champion. 

Wow, I carried hard for nothing here.

http://www.aliadore.com/nothing.jpg
So true lmfao
There's no F either, so if you just bump everything down a letter it all works out
That feel when you get an S every other game on Shyvana and she is only level 2

It's like the U.S. grading system but worse. Now if you don't get an S-, you failed. Anything below A means you're a chump. I can't even look myself in the eyes in the mirror when I get an A on my main.
This is one of those "incorrect board" posts.
The system of having S be beyond A exists in games that came out before the mastery system. Even in those games, getting an A feels like a failure.
